circumstances: Following an uneventful flight from New York-La Guardia, the crew completed the approach and landed properly. After touchdown, the captain requested the copilot for flaps up when the aircraft sank on its belly, skidded for several yards and came to rest, broken in two. All 36 occupants were evacuated safely while the aircraft was written off.
probable_cause: It was determined that the accident was caused by a misinterpretation from the copilot that raised the landing gear instead of the flaps, causing the aircraft to fail on its belly.
